transactionSet.name: Eligibility, Coverage or Benefit Information
transactionSet.description: This Draft Standard for Trial Use contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Eligibility, Coverage or Benefit Information Transaction Set (271) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. This transaction set can be used to communicate information about or changes to eligibility, coverage or benefits from information sources (such as - insurers, sponsors, payors) to information receivers (such as - physicians, hospitals, repair facilities, third party administrators, governmental agencies). This information includes but is not limited to: benefit status, explanation of benefits, coverages, dependent coverage level, effective dates, amounts for co-insurance, co-pays, deductibles, exclusions and limitations.

segment.name: Transaction Set Header
segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Beginning of Hierarchical Transaction
segment.description: To define the business hierarchical structure of the transaction set and identify the business application purpose and reference data, i.e., number, date, and time

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Structure Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the hierarchical application structure of a transaction set that utilizes the HL segment to define the structure of the transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Transaction Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of transaction

segment.name: Hierarchical Level
segment.description: To identify dependencies among and the content of hierarchically related groups of data segments

dataElement.name: Hierarchical ID Number
dataElement.description: A unique number assigned by the sender to identify a particular data segment in a hierarchical structure

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Parent ID Number
dataElement.description: Identification number of the next higher hierarchical data segment that the data segment being described is subordinate to

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Level Code
dataElement.description: Code defining the characteristic of a level in a hierarchical structure

dataElement.name: Hierarchical Child Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating if there are hierarchical child data segments subordinate to the level being described

segment.name: Trace
segment.description: To uniquely identify a transaction to an application

dataElement.name: Trace Type Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying which transaction is being referenced

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Originating Company Identifier
dataElement.description: A unique identifier designating the company initiating the funds transfer instructions. The first character is one-digit ANSI identification code designation (ICD) followed by the nine-digit identification number which may be an IRS employer identification number (EIN), data universal numbering system (DUNS), or a user assigned number; the ICD for an EIN is 1, DUNS is 3, user assigned number is 9

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

segment.name: Request Validation
segment.description: To specify the validity of the request and indicate follow-up action authorized

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Reject Reason Code
dataElement.description: Code assigned by issuer to identify reason for rejection

dataElement.name: Follow-up Action Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying follow-up actions allowed

dataElement.name: Exponent
dataElement.description: Power to which a unit is raised

dataElement.name: Multiplier
dataElement.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

dataElement.description: Power to which a unit is raised

dataElement.name: Multiplier
dataElement.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

dataElement.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

dataElement.name: Surface/Layer/Position Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

segment.name: Date or Time or Period
segment.description: To specify any or all of a date, a time, or a time period

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date Time Period Format Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

segment.name: Monetary Amount
segment.description: To indicate the total monetary amount

dataElement.name: Amount Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code to qualify amount

dataElement.name: Monetary Amount
dataElement.description: Monetary amount

dataElement.name: Credit/Debit Flag Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

segment.name: Percent Amounts
segment.description: To qualify percent amounts and supply percent amounts

dataElement.name: Percent Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code to qualify percent

dataElement.name: Percent
dataElement.description: Percentage expressed as a decimal

segment.name: Industry Code
segment.description: Code to transmit standard industry codes

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

segment.name: Monetary Amount
segment.description: To indicate the total monetary amount

dataElement.name: Amount Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code to qualify amount

dataElement.name: Monetary Amount

dataElement.name: Credit/Debit Flag Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

segment.name: Percent Amounts
segment.description: To qualify percent amounts and supply percent amounts

dataElement.name: Percent Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code to qualify percent

dataElement.name: Percent
dataElement.description: Percentage expressed as a decimal

segment.name: Loop Header
segment.description: To indicate that the next segment begins a loop

dataElement.name: Loop Identifier Code
dataElement.description: The loop ID number given on the transaction set diagram is the value for this data element in segments LS and LE

segment.name: Individual or Organizational Name
segment.description: To supply the full name of an individual or organizational entity

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Entity Type Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the type of entity

dataElement.name: Name Last or Organization Name
dataElement.description: Individual last name or organizational name

dataElement.name: Name First
dataElement.description: Individual first name

dataElement.name: Name Middle
dataElement.description: Individual middle name or initial

dataElement.name: Name Prefix
dataElement.description: Prefix to individual name

dataElement.name: Name Suffix
dataElement.description: Suffix to individual name

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Entity Relationship Code
dataElement.description: Code describing entity relationship

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

segment.name: Additional Name Information
segment.description: To specify additional names or those longer than 35 characters in length

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

segment.name: Address Information
segment.description: To specify the location of the named party

dataElement.name: Address Information
dataElement.description: Address information

dataElement.name: Address Information
dataElement.description: Address information

segment.name: Geographic Location
segment.description: To specify the geographic place of the named party

dataElement.name: City Name
dataElement.description: Free-form text for city name

dataElement.name: State or Province Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

dataElement.name: Postal Code
dataElement.description: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

segment.name: Administrative Communications Contact
segment.description: To identify a person or office to whom administrative communications should be directed

dataElement.name: Contact Function Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the major duty or responsibility of the person or group named

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Communication Number Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

dataElement.name: Communication Number
dataElement.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

dataElement.name: Communication Number Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

dataElement.name: Communication Number
dataElement.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

dataElement.name: Communication Number Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

dataElement.name: Communication Number
dataElement.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

dataElement.name: Contact Inquiry Reference
dataElement.description: Additional reference number or description to clarify a contact number

segment.name: Provider Information
segment.description: To specify the identifying characteristics of a provider

dataElement.name: Provider Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of provider

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: State or Province Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

dataElement.name: Provider Specialty Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the primary specialty of the provider, as defined by the receiver

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

dataElement.name: Provider Organization Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the organizational structure of a provider

segment.name: Loop Trailer
segment.description: To indicate that the loop immediately preceding this segment is complete

dataElement.name: Loop Identifier Code
dataElement.description: The loop ID number given on the transaction set diagram is the value for this data element in segments LS and LE

segment.name: Transaction Set Trailer
segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

dataElement.name: Number of Included Segments
dataElement.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
